ekthara pudgalika nalikawaka aadhunikayan gayana karana parani githa padika welandapolawala pawa sanyuktha thati lesa wikinimata thibena bawath, ee pilibandawa rahas polisiya wetha da paminili kara athi bawath mehidi anawaranaya wiya.ee mohothe dima polispathi mahinda balasuriya mahatha wetha durakathanayen amathu janadhipathithuma, melesa wikinimata athi nithi wirodhi ayurin nishpadanaya karana lada sanyuktha thati pilibandawath prawina gayaka gayikawange githa wancha sahagatha lesa nipadawa melesa wikinimata katayuthu kirima pilibandawath kadinamin awashya kriyamarga ganna lesa polispathiwarayata upades dunneya.gayana kshethraya niyojanaya karamin aacharya pandith amaradewa, kalakirthi latha walpola, mahacharya sanath nandasiri saha malkanthi nandasiri, aacharya dayarathna ranathunga, mahacharya amara ranathunga, sangithawedi sisira senarathna saha gayana shilpini indrani senarathna yana mahathma mahathmin saha gayana shilpi sunil shantha mahatha wenuwen ee mahathage diyaniya wana kalashantha mahathmiya da, githa rachana kshethraya wenuwen kalasuri arisen ahubudu, mahacharya sunil aariyarathna, aacharya ajantha ranasinha yana mahathwarun da, madawala es.
